restaurantInfo.cuisine: Authentic Hong Kong cuisine with pan-Asian specialties
restaurantInfo.atmosphere: Quiet, peaceful dining with cultural authenticity

allergies.glutenFree: Many dishes can be prepared gluten-free upon request
allergies.customization: Staff knowledgeable about ingredients and modifications
